text: ' Chicago Fire'DuShon Monique Brown Died of a Blood Infection'Chicago Fire'Star DuShon Monique Brown's Cause of Death Revealed EXCLUSIVE DuShon Monique Brown - - who played Connie on ` ` Chicago Fire'' - - died of a blood infection, but it's unclear how her system became contaminated... TMZ has learned. The Cook County Medical Examiner's Office tells us Brown's cause of death was sepsis, with an unknown origin. Sepsis typically occurs when harmful bacteria infiltrates the blood, often from an untreated wound. We're told other contributing factors to her death include high blood pressure and obesity.
